name: ether
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Restores 10 PP for a selected move.

flavor_text.ruby-sapphire: Restores the PP of a selected move by 10.
flavor_text.emerald: Restores the PP of a selected move by 10.
flavor_text.firered-leafgreen: Restores a selected move’s PP by 10 points for one POKéMON.
